comment: The masses need a narrative to give them the courage and permission to not only exist, but to thrive. Politics, race and religion go hand in hand. The (((main stream))) Purged this concept from Christian Hindu churches, thus causing the decrease in membership. But thy cant destroy the WORD. We can rebuild churches.
amr:
# ::snt The masses need a narrative to give them the courage and permission to not only exist, but to thrive. Politics, race and religion go hand in hand. The (((main stream))) Purged this concept from Christian Hindu churches, thus causing the decrease in membership. But thy cant destroy the WORD. We can rebuild churches.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / mass)
            :ARG1 (n2 / narrate-01)
            :purpose (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 n2
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (c / courage)
                        :op2 (p / permit-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (e / exist-01
                                          :ARG1 m2
                                          :mod (o / only
                                                :polarity -))
                                    :op2 (t / thrive-01
                                          :ARG1 m2))))
                  :ARG2 m2))
      :snt2 (g2 / go-22
            :ARG1 (p2 / politics)
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (r / race)
                  :op2 (r2 / religion))
            :manner (h / hand-in-hand))
      :snt3 (p3 / purge-01
            :ARG0 (s / stream
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / mainstream-02))
            :ARG1 (c2 / concept
                  :mod (t2 / this))
            :ARG2 (c3 / church
                  :mod (r3 / religious-group
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Hindu")
                        :mod r3
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Christian"))))
      :ARG0-of (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (d / decrease-01
                  :ARG1 (m4 / membership)))
      :snt4 (c5 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (p4 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (d2 / destroy-01
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "WORD")))))
      :snt5 p4
      :ARG1 (r4 / rebuild-01
            :ARG0 w
            :ARG1 (c6 / church)))

comment: The "WORD" is worthless. srry not srry
amr:

      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / string-entity
                  :value "srry")
            :ARG2 (s3 / string-entity
                  :value "srry")))

comment: If you have read your bible, you are describing the end of days. Think about it.
amr:

      :snt1 (d / describe-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (e / end-01
                  :ARG1 (d2 / day))
            :condition (r / read-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (b / book
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Bible")
                        :poss y)))
      :snt2 (t / think-01

            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (ii / it)))
